name: Aragon Protocol
description: Aragon's core mission is to deliver compliant privacy for everyone without compromising on compliance standards, including Anti-Money Laundering (AML) regulations and preventing illegal fundings. We believe that privacy and compliance can coexist harmoniously, empowering users in the crypto space to transact securely and confidently. Aragon offers a closed-loop privacy-centric ecosystem with a private swap, anti frontrun DEX, VPN, and more.
